item_content: I could complete the job using an unfamiliar software package … if I had a lot of time to complete the job for which the software was provided.
I could complete the job using an unfamiliar software package … if there was no one around to tell me what to do as I go.
I could complete the job using an unfamiliar software package … if I could call someone for help if I got stuck.
I could complete the job using an unfamiliar software package … if I had just the built-in help facility for assistance.
